name: IMAGinE (The Argonauts)
description:
Search for your missing girlfriend. Meet an eccentric artist. Get kidnapped to be whisked away onto a fullblown odyssey from the most exotic to the most mundane places you can imagine.
 In short: A day like any other.
 . ABOUT

IMAGinE is a point & click adventure game made for the AdventureJam 2021.

The game can be played in English or German.

CONTROLS
  • Left Click: Interact
  • Right Click: Inspect
  • Inventory: Top edge of the screen
  • Esc: Open Menu
  • Not compatible with touch devices

CREDITS

IMAGinE was created by "The Argonauts" in 2021 for the "AdvJam2021" jam on GameJolt at https://gamejolt.com/c/adventuredev/advjam2021

The game was developed in a fortnight.

Team Members
